command.name: help
command.help:
The help command displays help for a given command:

php bin\codecept help list

You can also output the help in other formats by using the --format option:

php bin\codecept help --format=xml list

To display the list of available commands, please use the list command.

option.name: --verbose
option.help: Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug

option.name: --no-interaction
option.help: Do not ask any interactive question.

command.name: list
command.help:
The list command lists all commands:

php bin\codecept list

You can also display the commands for a specific namespace:

php bin\console list test

You can also output the information in other formats by using the --format option:

php bin\console list --format=xml

It's also possible to get raw list of commands (useful for embedding command runner):

php bin\console list --raw

option.name: --format
option.help: To output list in other formats

command.name: analyze
command.help: Analyzes for non-existent methods and adds them to corresponding helper.

option.name: --config
option.help: Use specified config instead of default.

option.name: --verbose
option.help: Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug

option.name: --no-interaction
option.help: Do not ask any interactive question.

command.name: bootstrap
command.help:
Initializes empty test suite and default configuration file.

Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debugDisplay this application version.
Usage:
bootstrap [-ns|--namespace[="..."]] [path]
Arguments:
pathCustom installation path (default: ".")
Options:
--silentDon't ask for rebuild
--config (-c)Use custom path for config
--help (-h)Display this help message.
--quiet (-q)Do not output any message.
--verbose (-v|vv|vvv)
--version (-V)
--ansiForce ANSI output.
--no-ansiDisable ANSI output.
--no-interaction (-n)Do not ask any interactive question.

option.name: --namespace
option.help: Use specified namespace for generated Guy-classes.

option.name: --verbose
option.help: Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug

option.name: --no-interaction
option.help: Do not ask any interactive question.

command.name: build
command.help:
Generates base classes for all suites.

Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debugDisplay this application version.
Usage:
build [--silent] [-c|--config[="..."]]
Options:
--silentDon't ask for rebuild
--config (-c)Use custom path for config
--help (-h)Display this help message.
--quiet (-q)Do not output any message.
--verbose (-v|vv|vvv)
--version (-V)
--ansiForce ANSI output.
--no-ansiDisable ANSI output.
--no-interaction (-n)Do not ask any interactive question.

option.name: --no-colors
option.help: Force no colors in output (useful to override config file)

option.name: --silent
option.help: Only outputs suite names and final results

option.name: --group
option.help: Groups of tests to be executed (multiple values allowed)

option.name: --env
option.help: Run tests in selected environments. (multiple values allowed)

option.name: --verbose
option.help: Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug

option.name: --no-interaction
option.help: Do not ask any interactive question.

command.name: generate:cept
command.help:
Generates empty Cept file in suite.

Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debugDisplay this application version.
Usage:
generate:cept [-c|--config[="..."]] suite test
Arguments:
suiteSuite to be generated
testTest to be run
Options:
--config (-c)Use custom path for config
--help (-h)Display this help message.
--quiet (-q)Do not output any message.
--verbose (-v|vv|vvv)
--version (-V)
--ansiForce ANSI output.
--no-ansiDisable ANSI output.
--no-interaction (-n)Do not ask any interactive question.

command.name: generate:cest
command.help: Generates empty Cest file in suite

command.name: generate:phpunit
command.help: Generates empty PHPUnit test without Codeception additions

command.name: generate:scenarios
command.help: Generates text representation for all scenarios

command.name: generate:suite
command.help:
Generates new test suite.

Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debugDisplay this application version.
Usage:
generate:suite [-c|--config[="..."]] suite guy
Arguments:
suiteSuite to be generated
guyName of new Guy class
Options:
--silentDon't ask for rebuild
--config (-c)Use custom path for config
--help (-h)Display this help message.
--quiet (-q)Do not output any message.
--verbose (-v|vv|vvv)
--version (-V)
--ansiForce ANSI output.
--no-ansiDisable ANSI output.
--no-interaction (-n)Do not ask any interactive question.

command.name: generate:test
command.help: Generates empty unit test file in suite

command.name: refactor:add-namespace
command.help: Introduces namespace into the current configuration
